alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 1:56PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Johnson County through 230 PM MDT... At 156 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mayoworth, or 17 miles northwest of Kaycee, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mayoworth. This includes Interstate 25 near mile marker 258. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County
